game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, fragments of different eras have collided, creating a maelstrom of conflicting timelines. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with restoring order to the timestream by navigating through diverse environments and correcting anomalies in the fabric of reality.
game.beginning: The game begins in the year 2050, where humanity has colonized other planets but is plagued by the consequences of time travel. The player receives a cryptic message from their predecessor, a renowned Timekeeper who vanished on his last mission.
game.ending: As the player succeeds in correcting anomalies and repairing the timestream, they eventually uncover a sinister plot by rogue time travelers aiming to exploit the temporal distortions for their own gain. The final confrontation takes place across multiple timelines, requiring strategic thinking and quick reflexes to prevent catastrophic changes to history.
